Package pool.poolModel

Class Player

java.lang.Object
pool.poolModel.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a player in the billard game. A player represents a human playing billard his name, team, wins and if he is currently playing.
